backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, subscriptions, trades, mistakes, payments, admin auth, and QR code upload/clear functions with storage mixins and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence for recent frontend calculator and navigation changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing behavior of all major frontend components, tabs, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template loading fonts, initializing theme early, loading env config for canister ID, and mounting the Vite React app.
frontend/public/domain-slug.txt: Stores the app's domain slug identifier.
frontend/public/env.json: Holds a placeholder backend canister ID for runtime configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, backend connection state, error handling UI, tab navigation, and rendering core tabs including the Lot Size calculator.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Password prompt dialog that verifies admin access using a mutation and handles success or error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDisco: Interface for creating, editing, enabling/disabling, and deleting discount codes with timestamp conversion and form handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Main admin dashboard providing navigation to user management, payments, methods, discounts, QR codes, and password rotation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPayme: Manages creation, editing, enabling/disabling, and deletion of payment methods with basic form state.
Dialog for uploading, previewing, clearing, and validating payment QR code images with progress tracking.
Displays pending user payments and allows admins to view proofs, approve, or reject submissions with optional reasons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRotat: Dialog for permanent admins to rotate the admin password with validation, permission checks, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Admin dialog showing a user's profile, trades, subscription status, and actions to activate, cancel, or remove the user.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and automatic session clearing.
frontend/src/components/journal/EditTrad: Dialog to edit or delete a trade entry, allowing updates to date, session, pair, risk values, and outcome.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalA: Displays summary analytics for trades including totals, accuracy, and P/L with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/journal/ProfitCa: Monthly calendar showing daily net P/L and trade counts with month navigation and date selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeEnt: Form component for creating new trade entries, handling state, validation, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeLis: Displays a table of recorded trades with P/L calculations, loading states, and optional edit actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/ViewConta: Simple wrapper component that applies layout styling and renders child content.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/EditMis: Dialog for editing or deleting a mistake entry, including form handling and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/Mistake: Form for creating a new mistake entry with date, category, and description fields.
Displays a list of logged mistakes with category labels, dates, AI suggestions, and edit options.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar rendering tabs with icons and handling tab switching.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabSc: Wrapper that mounts only the active tab's content to prevent overlapping UI.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A dialog that collects full name and username to create a user profile and start a free trial, using form inputs and a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Pa: Handles payment submission for a selected plan, including uploading a PDF proof, entering transaction details, and showing confirmation after submission.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Displays subscription status, trial info, available plans, and routes to the payment view when a plan is selected.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Manages backend actor initialization with retries, health checks, and detailed status tracking for connection readiness or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntitlement.ts: Derives feature access and plan status (trial, expired, paid tiers) from the caller's subscription state and exposes loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login, logout, and tracking status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for initializing user access and performing CRUD operations on trades, mistakes, and related backend data using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and applies theme classes to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark themes, layout rules, safe-area handling, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/backendConnectionErrors: Classifies backend errors such as authorization, stopped canister, and misconfiguration, returning structured user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Gathers diagnostics about backend canister configuration, environment, and deployment type, detecting placeholder or missing IDs.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports branding constants including app name, tagline, and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/domainSlug.ts: Validates and generates deployment-safe domain slugs and exports the app's predefined slug.
frontend/src/lib/pipValues.ts: Provides pip value mappings for trading pairs and a helper to retrieve pip values with exclusions.
frontend/src/lib/riskCalculator.ts: Contains helpers for retrieving pip values and calculating lot size based on risk, stop-loss, and pip value.
frontend/src/lib/safeErrorMessage.ts: Maps various backend error messages to user-friendly strings with specific cases for payments, admin access, subscriptions, profiles, trades, and network issues.
frontend/src/lib/trades.ts: Provides helpers to calculate trade profit/loss and format currency and signed values.
frontend/src/lib/tradingPairs.ts: Defines trading pair options and an extended list for calculators with custom pair support.
frontend/src/lib/userId.ts: Formats numeric user IDs into padded display strings and parses them back to numbers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/tabs/AdminPanelTab.tsx: Handles admin access checks and renders either the admin panel, access dialog, or loading/error states.
frontend/src/tabs/JournalTab.tsx: Displays trade analytics, entry form, and list/calendar views with date filtering and error handling.
frontend/src/tabs/MistakesTab.tsx: Renders mistake logging tools with AI suggestion info and lists user-submitted mistakes.
frontend/src/tabs/ProfileTab.tsx: Shows user profile details, subscription status, and handles loading, errors, and subscription view toggling.
frontend/src/tabs/RiskCalculatorTab.tsx: Implements a risk calculator with form validation, pip value handling, and position size computation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, dark mode, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and state tracking for tasks related to updating the calculator to an account lot size calculator.
